@startuml(id=SystemContext)
scale max 2000x1409
title CSIS - System Context
caption CSIS System Context

skinparam {
  shadowing false
  arrowColor #707070
  actorBorderColor #707070
  componentBorderColor #707070
  rectangleBorderColor #707070
  noteBackgroundColor #ffffff
  noteBorderColor #707070
  rectangleFontColor #ffffff
  rectangleStereotypeFontColor #ffffff
}
rectangle 3 <<Software System>> #1168bd [
  CSIS
  - -
  Climate Service Information
  System
]
actor "Customer" <<Person>> as 1 #08427b
note right of 1
  Climate Service Customer
end note
rectangle 4 <<Software System>> #1168bd [
  Marketplace
  - -
  Climate Service Marketplace
]
rectangle 5 <<Software System>> #1168bd [
  Platforms and Portals
  - -
  External (Climate) Data
  Infrasrtuctures, Servive
  Platform and Portals
]
actor "Supplier" <<Person>> as 2 #08427b
note right of 2
  Climate Service Supplier
end note
1 .[#707070].> 3 : perform climate addaptation study
1 .[#707070].> 4 : discover additional products and services
4 .[#707070].> 3 : promote products and services
2 .[#707070].> 4 : offer value-added products and services
@enduml

Country: DE
--></g></svg>

sections.title: DeploymentView.svg
sections.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" contentScriptType="application/ecmascript" contentStyleType="text/css" height="412px" preserveAspectRatio="none" style="width:511px;height:412px;" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 511 412" width="511px" zoomAndPan="magnify"><defs/><g><text fill="#000000" font-family="sans-serif" font-size="18" lengthAdjust="spacingAndGlyphs" textLength="273" x="113" y="18.6855">CSIS - Deployment - Development</text><!--cluster 12--><polygon fill="#FFFFFF" points="72,56.6406,82,46.6406,415,46.6406,415,348.6406,405,358.6406,72,358.6406,72,56.6406" style="stroke: #000000; stroke-width: 1.5;"/><line style="stroke: #000000; stroke-width: 1.5;" x1="405" x2="414" y1="56.6406" y2="47.6406"/><line style="stroke: #000000; stroke-width: 1.5;" x1="72" x2="405" y1="56.6406" y2="56.6406"/><line style="stroke: #000000; stroke-width: 1.5;" x1="405" x2="405" y1="56.6406" y2="358.6406"/><text fill="#000000" font-family="sans-serif" font-size="14" font-style="italic" lengthAdjust="spacingAndGlyphs" textLength="262" x="108.5" y="74.1738">«Microsoft Windows 10 or Apple macOS»</text><text fill="#000000" font-family="sans-serif" font-size="14" font-weight="bold" lengthAdjust="spacingAndGlyphs" textLength="126" x="176.5" y="91.7832">Developer Laptop</text><!--cluster 13--><polygon fill="#FFFFFF" points="96,123.6406,106,113.6406,391,113.6406,391,324.6406,381,334.6406,96,334.6406,96,123.6406" style="stroke: #000000; stroke-width: 1.5;"/><line style="stroke: #000000; stroke-width: 1.5;" x1="381" x2="390" y1="123.6406" y2="114.6406"/><line style="stroke: #000000; stroke-width: 1.5;" x1="96" x2="381" y1="123.6406" y2="123.6406"/><line style="stroke: #000000; stroke-width: 1.5;" x1="381" x2="381" y1="123.6406" y2="334.6406"/><text fill="#000000" font-family="sans-serif" font-size="14" font-style="italic" lengthAdjust="spacingAndGlyphs" textLength="62" x="208.5" y="141.1738">«Docker»</text><text fill="#000000" font-family="sans-serif" font-size="14" font-weight="bold" lengthAdjust="spacingAndGlyphs" textLength="219" x="130" y="158.7832">Docker Container - Web Server</text><!--cluster 14--><polygon fill="#FFFFFF" points="137,190.6406,147,180.6406,350,180.6406,350,300.6406,340,310.6406,137,310.6406,137,190.6406" style="stroke: #000000; stroke-width: 1.5;"/><line style="stroke: #000000; stroke-width: 1.5;" x1="340" x2="349" y1="190.6406" y2="181.6406"/><line style="stroke: #000000; stroke-width: 1.5;" x1="137" x2="340" y1="190.6406" y2="190.6406"/><line style="stroke: #000000; stroke-width: 1.5;" x1="340" x2="340" y1="190.6406" y2="310.6406"/><text fill="#000000" font-family="sans-serif" font-size="14" font-style="italic" lengthAdjust="spacingAndGlyphs" textLength="137" x="171" y="208.1738">«Apache Tomcat 8.x»</text><text fill="#000000" font-family="sans-serif" font-size="14" font-weight="bold" lengthAdjust="spacingAndGlyphs" textLength="106" x="186.5" y="225.7832">Apache Tomcat</text><!--entity 15--><rect fill="#DDDDDD" height="55.2188" style="stroke: #707070; stroke-width: 1.5;" width="155" x="165.5" y="239.6406"/><text fill="#FFFFFF" font-family="sans-serif" font-size="14" font-style="italic" lengthAdjust="spacingAndGlyphs" textLength="78" x="204" y="264.1738">«Container»</text><text fill="#FFFFFF" font-family="sans-serif" font-size="14" lengthAdjust="spacingAndGlyphs" textLength="135" x="175.5" y="281.7832">Runtime Environment</text><text fill="#000000" font-family="sans-serif" font-size="14" lengthAdjust="spacingAndGlyphs" textLength="499" x="0" y="399.1738">An example development deployment scenario for the Internet Banking System.</text><!--
@startuml(id=DeploymentView)
scale max 2000x1409
title CSIS - Deployment - Development
caption An example development deployment scenario for the Internet Banking System.

skinparam {
  shadowing false
  arrowColor #707070
  actorBorderColor #707070
  componentBorderColor #707070
  rectangleBorderColor #707070
  noteBackgroundColor #ffffff
  noteBorderColor #707070
  rectangleFontColor #ffffff
  rectangleStereotypeFontColor #ffffff
}
node "Developer Laptop" <<Microsoft Windows 10 or Apple macOS>> as 12 {
  node "Docker Container - Web Server" <<Docker>> as 13 {
    node "Apache Tomcat" <<Apache Tomcat 8.x>> as 14 {
      rectangle "Runtime Environment" <<Container>> as 15 #dddddd
    }
  }
}
@enduml

deploymentViews.description: An example development deployment scenario for the Internet Banking System.
